generated_body: In the article titled "Surgeon Shocked After Doing Double Lung Transplant on Teen Vaper: 'Evil I Haven't Faced Before'," the user may expect to read about the complexities and challenges faced by medical professionals when treating young patients with serious health issues related to vaping.
